title: There is so much sex going on in the world
description: Martin and James have this really interesting conversation going on, on the Facebook video channel. It looks at first as if James is only in it for talking dirty, but then Martin discovers that his interlocutor has a cute boyfriend who needs some more excitement in his life, and then the two discover that they are neighbors...  A sizzling novella---short, sweet and edgy---which won't leave you disappointed, especially if you are into casual sex.
author: Michael Ampersant
